verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> that came to Mikhah <S%H4318><s%> the Morasthite <S%H4183><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Yotam <S%H3147><s%>, Ahaz <S%H271><s%>, and Hizkiyah-yahu <S%H3169><s%>, kings <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, which he saw <S%H2372><s%> <S%H8804><s%> concerning SHomron <S%H8111><s%> and Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, all ye people <S%H5971><s%>; hearken <S%H7181><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, O earth <S%H776><s%>, and all that therein <S%H4393><s%> is: and let the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> be witness <S%H5707><s%> against you, the YY <S%H136><s%> from his holy <S%H6944><s%> temple <S%H1964><s%>.

For, behold, the YY <S%H3068><s%> cometh forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> out of his place <S%H4725><s%>, and will come down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and tread <S%H1869><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon the high places <S%H1116><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall be molten <S%H4549><s%> <S%H8738><s%> under him, and the valleys <S%H6010><s%> shall be cleft <S%H1234><s%> <S%H8691><s%>, as wax <S%H1749><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%>, and as the waters <S%H4325><s%> that are poured <S%H5064><s%> <S%H8716><s%> down a steep place <S%H4174><s%>.

For the transgression <S%H6588><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> is all this, and for the sins <S%H2403><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>. What is the transgression <S%H6588><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>? is it not SHomron <S%H8111><s%>? and what are the high places <S%H1116><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>? are they not Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> ?

Therefore I will make <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> SHomron <S%H8111><s%> as an heap <S%H5856><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, and as plantings <S%H4302><s%> of a vineyard <S%H3754><s%>: and I will pour down <S%H5064><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the stones <S%H68><s%> thereof into the valley <S%H1516><s%>, and I will discover <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the foundations <S%H3247><s%> thereof.

And all the graven images <S%H6456><s%> thereof shall be beaten to pieces <S%H3807><s%> <S%H8714><s%>, and all the hires <S%H868><s%> thereof shall be burned <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with the fire <S%H784><s%>, and all the idols <S%H6091><s%> thereof will I lay <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%>: for she gathered <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it of the hire <S%H868><s%> of an harlot <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and they shall return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the hire <S%H868><s%> of an harlot <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

Therefore I will wail <S%H5594><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and howl <S%H3213><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, I will go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> stripped <S%H7758><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H7758><s%> and naked <S%H6174><s%>: I will make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a wailing <S%H4553><s%> like the dragons <S%H8577><s%>, and mourning <S%H60><s%> as the owls <S%H1323><s%> <S%H3284><s%>.

For her wound <S%H4347><s%> is incurable <S%H605><s%> <S%H8803><s%>; for it is come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>; he is come <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the gate <S%H8179><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>, even to Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

Declare <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> ye it not at Gat <S%H1661><s%>, weep <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ye not at all <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: in the house of Aphrah <S%H1036><s%> roll <S%H6428><s%> <S%H8690><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H6428><s%> <S%H8694><s%> thyself in the dust <S%H6083><s%>.

Pass ye away <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, thou inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Saphir <S%H8208><s%>, having thy shame <S%H1322><s%> naked <S%H6181><s%>: the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Zaanan <S%H6630><s%> came not forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the mourning <S%H4553><s%> of Bethezel <S%H1018><s%>; he shall receive <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of you his standing <S%H5979><s%>.

For the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Maroth <S%H4796><s%> waited carefully <S%H2342><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for good <S%H2896><s%>: but evil <S%H7451><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from the YY <S%H3068><s%> unto the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

O thou inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Lachish <S%H3923><s%>, bind <S%H7573><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the chariot <S%H4818><s%> to the swift beast <S%H7409><s%>: she is the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of the sin <S%H2403><s%> to the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>: for the transgressions <S%H6588><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> were found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in thee.

Therefore shalt thou give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> presents <S%H7964><s%> to Moreshethgath <S%H4182><s%>: the houses <S%H1004><s%> of Achzib <S%H392><s%> shall be a lie <S%H391><s%> to the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Yet will I bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> an heir <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto thee, O inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Mareshah <S%H4762><s%>: he shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Adullam <S%H5725><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Make thee bald <S%H7139><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and poll <S%H1494><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thee for thy delicate <S%H8588><s%> children <S%H1121><s%>; enlarge <S%H7337><s%> <S%H8685><s%> thy baldness <S%H7144><s%> as the eagle <S%H5404><s%>; for they are gone into captivity <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from thee.
